structure.unit: Jurisdiction And Emblems Of The Commonwealth, The General Court, Statutes And Public Documents

law.catch_line: Uniforms For Sergeant At Arms And Other Employees
law.text: [ Text of section effective until January 1, 2013. For text effective January 1, 2013, see below.] Subject to such annual appropriation as may be made for the purpose, the sergeant-at-arms may purchase at the expense of the commonwealth such uniforms for himself, the doorkeepers, assistant doorkeepers, general court officers and pages as he may determine. Chapter 3: Uniforms for sergeant-at-arms and other employees [ Text of section as amended by 2012, 165, Sec. 4 effective January 1, 2013. See 2012, 165, Sec. 137. For text effective until January 1, 2013, see above.] Subject to appropriation, the sergeant-at-arms may purchase uniforms for the sergeant-at-arms, general court officers and pages as the sergeant-at-arms may determine.
